pages.title: Crafting Template
pages.text: There may come a time when you feel you need a certain material so often that you want to automate it. Or you are one of those masochists who automate every single item because they can. Then you've come to the right place!

In the Pedestal Crafting Template you can specify your desired recipe.$(br2)The $(l:general/pedestal)Pigment Pedestal$() has a dedicated slot for a Pedestal Crafting Template. When you add items with hoppers or similar to the pedestal, they will be placed appropriately and evenly.$(br)Alternatively, you can use the pedestal crafting template in the $(l:general/pedestal)Pigment Pedestal$() as a placeholder.
